thread.title: Best drink deals for National Margarita Day on Wednesday
thread.title_full: Best drink deals for National Margarita Day on Wednesday

author: Doreen Christensen
title: Best drink deals for National Margarita Day on Wednesday
text:
Best drink deals for National Margarita Day on Wednesday Polynesian paradise: Mai-Kai is top tiki bar in the universe 
World famous Mai-Kai in Fort Lauderdale, voted the No. 1 tiki bar in the world on Crikiki.com , offers half-price drinks, appetizers and BOGO dining deals. Doreen Christensen The classic margaritas is $2.22 at participating locations on Wednesday.
Chili's: $5 premium margaritas all day, including the popular Presidente all day. No coupon needed. 
On the Border: $3 house margaritas all day Wednesday. 
Tequila Sunrise: Slurp $5.99 top shelf margaritas at the Oakland Park eatery use a coupon for a free entree with purchase, plus join the VIP Club and get a freebie. 
In time for Cinco de Mayo, we compiled 21 margarita spots from Miami to West Palm Beach. These margaritas range from pomegranate to jalape√±o and everything in-between. (Barbara Corbellini Duarte, Talia J. Medina)
